name: Todo App
description: Todo application that can manage daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly tasks. Supports user authentication and saves personal tasks to the database. Implements Japan time (UTC+9) adjustment functionality.
architecture: Implements data operations with Next.js App Router + Server Actions. Manages Todo model with Prisma, categorizing by period using type field (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly) and period start dates (weekStart/monthStart/yearStart). Realizes client-side state management with React Context API (TodosContext). Performs user authentication with NextAuth.js to manage Todos per user. Implements Japan time adjustment (UTC+9) on the server side (add 9 hours when saving, subtract 9 hours when retrieving). Invalidates cache per user ID and type with revalidateTag (`${userId}-${type}-todos`). Generates IDs client-side with cuid to achieve Optimistic Updates.
features: Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly Todo management (categorized by type field and period start dates)
Add, delete, and toggle completion status of Todos
Personal data management with user authentication (NextAuth.js)
Display of past and future daily Todos via date selection
List display of incomplete Todos (UndoneTodos component)
Year and month navigation functionality (using lucide-react icons)
